title: Restaurants, QSRs' hiring appetite likely to grow in next 12 months
description: Mamagoto plans to hire about 400 people in the next 12 months, with 20 new stores in the pipeline, while Wow! Momo and McDonald's are set to add 1,200-1,500 people each in the next 12 to 15 months. Burger Singh is looking to open about 250 new stores and more than doubling its headcount to 2,500 people by the end of 2024-25.
